stimulusHtml:
The function h is differentiable, and for all values of x,  h ( x ) = h ( 2 − x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42EF@ . Which of the following statements must be true?

I. ∫ 0 2 h ( x ) d x > 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4608@

II. h ′ ( 1 ) = 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E38@

III. h ′ ( 0 ) = h ′ ( 2 ) = 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@429B@
